description: Borrowed from Ancient Greek νυκταλωπία (nuktalōpía), from νύξ (núx, “night”), ἀλαός (alaós, “blind”), and ὄψ (óps, “eye”).

nouns.description: nyctalopia (countable and uncountable, plural nyctalopias or nyctalopiae)

entries.meaning: (medicine) The inability to see clearly in dim light; night blindness
